title: Jhin Login Theme Sheets
body:
Hey so as a violin player the moment I heard Jhin's theme I immediately wanted to play it because its just?? So awesome!!!  Except I am awful at playing by ear......
I heard that there would be sheet music released for this at some point and I was wondering if anyone already wrote sheets for the violin solo or if official sheets were floating around that I have yet to find because, like all of us probably would agree, that theme is hella sweet.
Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey Venixa,

We're still trying to find a good way to distribute sheet music to our players. Stay tuned!
